summary: Workflow history replay fails with a nondeterminism error when child workflows are present, even though the child workflow IDs are generated fresh from the history. The error indicates a mismatch between scheduled event IDs and command IDs for child workflows during replay.
userImpact: Users cannot run workflow history compatibility tests in CI to prevent nondeterministic changes when workflows contain child workflows.
rootCause: Issue #1744 identified as likely cause; related to child workflow ID generation during replay
keyQuote: Child workflow id of scheduled event does not match child workflow id of command - This means that the workflow code as written is not compatible with the history
